page.title: 11PRIMARY SCHOOL,CAUNTON
page.content: {Dean Hole Church of England School. { {The original school.}This school was built in 1840.A new school was opened in 1971. {The present school. There are at present 35 children attending the school.These are divided into two class groups,18 in the infant classroom with Mrs C.Thompson and 17 with the headteacher Mr S.S.Millard. Additional teaching is provided on a part-time basis by an assistant teacher and a music specialist. Secretarial help is provided for 5 hours each week. The school also has a cook supervisor,a kitchen assistant , lunch-time supervisor and a caretaker.
